example.text: And the administration 's deal with Congress gives several congressional committees the right to cut off even humanitarian aid next month , though the committees are likely to let aid continue until February .
example.arg: gives several congressional committees the right to cut off even humanitarian aid next month , though the committees are likely to let aid continue until February
